review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Phases 2+3: Panel declutter (data-tab-group + Dev toggle + localStorage) and Feed enhancement (chat-style messages, escapeHtml XSS protection, append-only DOM, 500-entry cap, debounced search, noise filtering, AWAITING HUMAN banner). Cross-file audit: no broken refs, filter logic matches HTML data-filter attrs. 93 suites / 2996 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
